actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, Education and Labor, the Judiciary, Oversight and Reform, Rules, the Budget, Armed Services, and House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To address the high costs of health care services, prescription drugs, and health insurance coverage in the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Fair Care Act of 2022 This bill addresses the health care system, including Medicare, Medicaid, the private health insurance market, and the prescription drug approval process. The bill also revises tax provisions related to certain health care costs and establishes requirements for lawsuits involving health care provided, at least in part, through a federal program or with federal funds.

titles.title: To address the high costs of health care services, prescription drugs, and health insurance coverage in the United States, and for other purposes.
